UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Hevein-Like Antimicrobial Peptides Wamps: Structure-Function Relationship in Antifungal Activity and Sensitization of Plant Pathogenic Fungi to Tebuconazole by WAMP-2-Derived Peptides.
Literature.Author: Odintsova T, Shcherbakova L, Slezina M, Pasechnik T, Kartabaeva B, Istomina E, Dzhavakhiya V

Literature.Title: Fragments of a Wheat Hevein-Like Antimicrobial Peptide Augment the Inhibitory Effect of a Triazole Fungicide on Spore Germination of Fusarium oxysporum and Alternaria solani.
Literature.Author: Shcherbakova L, Odintsova T, Pasechnik T, Arslanova L, Smetanina T, Kartashov M, Slezina M, Dzhavakhiya V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bipolaris sorokiniana(IC50=429.5±51.5µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum VKM F-137(IC50=>700µg/ml),Alternaria alternata(IC50=550.4±41.3µg/ml),Cladosporium cucumerinum(IC50=5.3±0.1µg/ml),Fusarium culmorum(IC50=>700µg/ml),Fusarium avenaceum(no activity data),Parastagonospora nodorum(IC50=329.6±7.9µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. lycopersici(ED50=35.2µg/ml),Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. lycopersici(MFC=106.9µg/ml),Alternaria solani(ED50=0.55µg/ml),Alternaria solani(MFC=53.4µg/ml)
